Docs.summary: Fills in values of a multi-dimensional rectangular array to specified value based on the position and size given. Ranges given outside the bounds of the array will fill in as much as possible and ignore elements that should appear outside it. Won't throw bounds exception, just won't do work if ranges out of bounds.
